6ddd17cf35914b23199f7316be5ba65b (06:40): 59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc: "the obstacles to Mozilla informing users when Firefox asks about installing third party addons" -- I don't follow

54e41c406ca8e1a8af656c42c41fba05 (06:41): maybe "informing users when firefox notices a silent 3rd-party addon install"?

59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc (06:41): 6ddd17cf35914b23199f7316be5ba65b, if we show about:newaddon, wondering if we can tell the user about the addon they're being asked to install
59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc (06:42): "Mozilla thinks this addon sucks, install at your own risk"
6ddd17cf35914b23199f7316be5ba65b (06:42): 59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc: so Firefox would show about:newaddon instead of the existing opt-in check?
59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc (06:42): that is the opt in check
6ddd17cf35914b23199f7316be5ba65b (06:43): 59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc: oh, I see... you want to provide a description of the add-ons function?
6ddd17cf35914b23199f7316be5ba65b (06:43): 59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc: that could be good... would mozilla be in charge of maintaining those descriptions?
6ddd17cf35914b23199f7316be5ba65b (06:43): or would the add-on provide it?
59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc (06:44): I'd do it through AMO, they already review addons so they'd know what they're looking at
59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc (06:44): er, AMO editors that is
6ddd17cf35914b23199f7316be5ba65b (06:44): 59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc: what if we didn't have a description for an add-on?
59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc (06:45): dunno
59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc (06:45): "Mozilla can't tell you anything about this addon"?
9139b5bbff3c9c6a37be5d2af014270f (06:45): "this addon is somewhere between 'sucks' and 'awesome'. It's up to you to decide!"
6ddd17cf35914b23199f7316be5ba65b (06:46): I say we just nuke about:addons.  Let the users enable the add-on from within about:addons if they want ti

59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc (06:46): but basically, users are being asked to make a decision without any information provided
6ddd17cf35914b23199f7316be5ba65b (06:46): other than the add-on name
59e570bef8ead953686ff65207d2dfbc (06:46): nuke about:addons too. Unfocused, you're fired
